entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A student who is glared at Harry for not doing well in a performance.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A student and friend of Marietta's, who has trouble with magic spells.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Cho's curly-haired friend whose sleeve caught fire during the performance.

entities.name: expelliarmious
entities.description: A magic spell that Cho tries to cast but gets wrong.

entities.name: expellimellius
entities.description: Another magic spell that Cho tries to cast but gets wrong.

relationships.description: Zacharias Smith glares at Harry for not doing well in a performance.
Harry's presence makes Cho nervous during the performance.
Marietta blames Harry for making her nervous and causing her sleeve to catch fire.
